title: The Trapper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player's house to place a Trap at.
- At night, pick a Trap back up.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You only have one Trap.
- After a Trap is triggered, you automatically are forced to pick it back up the next night.
- The trap will be triggered if someone visits and attacks the player. You will deal a basic attack to the attacker. If there are multiple attackers, a random one is chosen.
- Your trap grants basic defense to the player it's on.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5376
*She knows both the inside workings of flesh and steel. She not only traps to satiate her stomach, but to satiate her sick desire for power.*
